message:
1. admin brothers of basherkella, i owe uh guys a salute and this is mine "salute "
u shuld be proud of urself , u make a diference

by: Arman S Chowdhury

2. amar khub kharaf lagche..

Amader 149,657 aie bishal poriber k bicchinno kore dite jalim sorkar abar basherkella bondo korar uddog niyeche.

Ami amar prio admin vai k bolchi, amon akta bebosto koren, jate amra, notun basherkella k khuje pete kosto na hoi.

Notun basherkellai onoboroto sekh hasina k bash deya hobe, sure !!

by: Mohammad Yeasin Arafat

3. basherkella bonder shuparish kore shorkar tader nastikota o munafikotar obostan dirro korece . Tader lojja kore na musolman(nastik)hoye o islami rastre nastik der blog bondo na kore islami blog bondo korte? Are shorkar to musolman na.sob dormo mile jaroj dormo ai shorkarer 

by: H M Sadik Khan
